channel.title: Tiles on Suntimes
channel.description: Recent content in Tiles on Suntimes

item.title: Manage Tiles
item.description: Add, Remove Tiles Configure Tiles Add, Remove Tiles Pull down from the top of the screen to open the system tray, then tap to edit. To add a tile, hold and drag the tile to the top of the tray. To remove a tile, hold and drag the tile to the bottom of the tray (unused area). Configure Tiles From the system tray, tap a tile to open the tile dialog, then tap Settings (bottom left).
